General.Name: Chongqing Three Gorges Water Conservancy and Electric Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Three Gorges Water Conservancy and Electric Power Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the production and sale of electricity in China. It owns and operates hydropower stations with an installed capacity of 750,000 kilowatts. The company is also involved in the manganese ore mining; electrolytic manganese production, processing, and sales; and supply of thermal unified power. Chongqing Three Gorges Water Conservancy and Electric Power Co., Ltd. was founded in 1929 and is based in Chongqing, China.
